thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TRI Pointe Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TRI Pointe Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.28
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - TRI Pointe Group Inc:
* TRI POINTE GROUP, INC. REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q1 REVENUE $582.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $551.3 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ANTICIPATES ITS HOMEBUILDING GROSS MARGIN PERCENTAGE WILL BE IN A RANGE OF 21.0% TO 21.5% FOR Q2
* UPDATING ITS HOMEBUILDING GROSS MARGIN PERCENTAGE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 TO BE IN RANGE OF 21.0% TO 21.5%
* BACKLOG UNITS AT QUARTER END OF 2,143 HOMES COMPARED TO 1,734, HOMES , AN INCREASE OF 24% FROM Q1 2017
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $551.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
